solution_line_template: She has mowed {total_area_mowed} square feet because {num_lawns_mowed} x {lawn_length} x {lawn_width} = <<{num_lawns_mowed}*{lawn_length}*{lawn_width}={total_area_mowed}>>{total_area_mowed}
She has to earn ${money_needed_more} more dollars because {book_set_cost} - {money_earned} = <<{book_set_cost}-{money_earned}={money_needed_more}>>{money_needed_more}
She has to mow {sq_ft_to_mow_more} more square feet of lawns because {money_needed_more} / {charge_per_sq_ft} = <<{money_needed_more}/{charge_per_sq_ft}={sq_ft_to_mow_more}>>{sq_ft_to_mow_more}
